programme.title: Tepepa
programme.desc: In early 20th-century Mexico, the guerrilla leader Tepepa is saved from execution by Doctor Price, an Englishman. Tepepa, a hero of the Revolution, is curious about the doctor’s motives. The chilling answer: to kill him himself. A deadly game of cat and mouse begins between Tepepa and the ruthless police chief, Cascorro.

programme.title: I Am Sartana, Your Angel of Death
programme.desc: A bank that was thought to be impenetrable is robbed by a man wearing the trademark Sartana cloak. Our black-clad hero soon has a price on his head and must try to proof his innocence with the help of his shabby friend Buddy Ben.

programme.title: Troublemakers
programme.desc: Two brothers who hate each other are going to spend Christmas with their mother. She tries to get them together.

programme.title: Shadow of Sartana
programme.desc: Sartana has a bounty on his head and he's wanted dead or alive. To eliminate this he makes a deal with the local politicians. If he hunts down the marauding Randal Brothers, the bounty will be removed.

programme.title: A Few Dollars for Django
programme.desc: Regan, a bounty hunter looking to start a new life, is pulled back into action when a murder sends him after bank robbers. In Montana, he steps into a range war between farmers and cattlemen while investigating. With a sheriff's star in hand, Regan must navigate dangerous territory to bring justice while seeking his own peace.

programme.title: Pancho Villa
programme.desc: A double-cross in an arms deal prompts Mexican revolutionary Pancho Villa to raid a US Army weapons depot in Columbus, New Mexico.

programme.title: One Dollar Too Many
programme.desc: Suave gambler Clay Watson, cocky sharpshooter Moses Lang, and wily thespian Edwin Kean are a trio of criminals in the Old West.

programme.title: Crazy Westerners
programme.desc: Little Rita is a female gunslinger who travels to the Far West chasing outlaws. She takes gold from them and hides it in a cave which she plans to blow up one day and get rid of the root of all evil: money.

programme.title: A Coffin for the Sheriff
programme.desc: Spaghetti Western icon Anthony Steffen stars as Shenandoah, a mysterious man who joins a ruthless band of highwaymen after overcoming an almost impossible and death-defying initiation.

programme.title: The Great Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: A blind man wants to get his mitts on a crooks' gold. He can't do it alone, so he hires the quartet of soldiers-of-fortune to help him.

programme.title: There's a Noose Waiting for You Trinity!
programme.desc: Trinity is an ex-gunslinger desperately wanting to be forgiven and accepted by his family that he abandoned years earlier. Unfortunately for him, a ruthless bounty hunter is on his trail.

programme.title: Deadly Trackers
programme.desc: Jeff sets out to murder each one of the five outlaws who robbed, raped and killed his poor sister.

programme.title: Apache Fury
programme.desc: A judge encounters a man (Frank Latimore) he once wronged after an Apache attack. The attack forces him, his fiancée and their fellow stagecoach passengers to take refuge at a rest stop.

programme.title: Shango
programme.desc: Shango is a Texas Ranger who finds himself up against a former Confederate officer and his gang of thugs who have been terrorizing a local border town in search of gold.

programme.title: Heroes of Fort Worth
programme.desc: During the Civil War, a group of confederate soldiers with the help of Apache Indians, try to defeat a Union fort, while trying to gain support from Emperor Maximillian of Mexico.
